channel.title: My new spell book sprite issue [PI]
channel.description:
So I am trying to add completely new custom spells into a new spell book. The only problem is im having trouble getting my sprites to load. I really have no idea how to go about doing it but i have this much so far. I need a bit of assistance getting the sprite going though.
[IMG]http://i280.photobucket.com/albums/kk184/50percentelf/invisiblesprite.png[/img]
As you can see ive added the button without the sprite.

item.title: My new spell book sprite issue [PI]
item.dc:creator: @50percentelf 50percentelf

@50percentelf wrote:

I cant get those lines to load my custom sprites lol guess i just fail ;3

item.title: My new spell book sprite issue [PI]
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Place the sprite in a folder in the sprites folder and name it,
DEFUALTSPRITENAME ID

Just look at the other sprites, and codes in rsinterface, were you not paying attention when I taught you this

Read full topic
